description.value:
Trigger A living creature enters area C6

Effect Pent-up magical energy from another world begins to release in waves of overwhelming sound. The hazard rolls initiative.

stealth.details: (legendary) to notice the low vibration forming in the area surrounding the apocalypse seed; noticing the apocalypse seed itself has a DC of 0

details.description: An overwhelming trumpeting fills the area as the apocalypse seed vibrates and shakes off the encrusted bone that's accreted around it to reveal a large tooth fragment from some immense monster.
details.disable: @Check[arcana|dc:50] (master), @Check[occultism|dc:50] (legendary), or @Check[religion|dc:50] (legendary) to recognize and shore up the area against the localized planar instability causing a connection between the apocalypse seed and Jandelay, or @Check[athletics|dc:53] (legendary) to grasp the apocalypse seed and muffle its vibrations with your embrace. Four successes are needed to muffle the aura enough against the planar instability and end the hazard.

publication.title: Pathfinder Adventure Path #221: Into the Apocalypse Archive

details.reset: The apocalypse seed creates another area of instability after 24 hours.
details.routine:

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes @Damage[(2d10+10)[sonic]] damage.

Failure The creature takes @Damage[(4d10+20)[sonic]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed]{Slowed 1} until the start of the hazard's next turn.
